page.title: 06A Day In The Life Of My Dad
page.content: My Dad gets up at 6am.He does his household chores,washes his overalls and then sweeps out the storeroom.At 7am he does some gardening;sowing vegetable seeds,weeding,watering plants and harvesting the crops.In the Summer he is very busy picking peas and runner beans.About 500 pea plants and about 80 bean plants are grown each year.He then walks 2 miles to the farm where he works.When he gets there he prepares the tractors to take feed out to the 500 cattle and calves. it takes two hours to feed them their silage and rolled barley.During the next four hours he cleans out the cubicles and beds them with straw.Dad then does maintenance jobs around the farm and feeds the cattle before walking home for his evening meal.
